Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate a design problem where people need to communicate over long distances.
The student can draw how a string telephone works to send or receive information.
The student can show the materials used to build the string telephone.
The student can depict the use of sound in their drawing to communicate through the device.
The student can illustrate the features of their string telephone that make it effective for communication.
The student can demonstrate how the string telephone helps people communicate over distances in their drawing.
